org.hibernate.search.indexes.serialization.impl

Class LuceneWorkHydrator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.search.indexes.serialization.impl.LuceneWorkHydrator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LuceneWorksBuilder

    public class LuceneWorkHydrator
extends Object
implements LuceneWorksBuilder
    Default implementation of the LuceneWorksBuilder. An instance is passed to the Deserializer.deserialize(byte[] , LuceneWorksBuilder ) method of the de-serializer of a given SerializationProvider.
    Author:
    Emmanuel Bernard <emmanuel@hibernate.org>, Sanne Grinovero
